posts.name:
Nerea Arregui Exposito
Nerea Arregui Exposito
posts.content:
Can AI revolutionize regression testing? Here’s how we’re doing it at Mchange 

We recently revamped our website,a perfect opportunity to put our AI-powered QA workflow to the test.

Could AI effectively enhance regression testing? The answer is a resounding yes!

Here’s how we’re integrating AI into our workflow and tackling challenges along the way:

️ Planning with the documentation assistant:
Our assistant generates test requirements, plans, and cases from source code comparisons, setting a solid foundation for testing.
️ Test case execution:
AI provides step-by-step guidance to execute test cases and logs outcomes automatically, simplifying a traditionally manual process.
️ Efficient debugging:
When bugs arise, our assistant creates detailed reports with actionable debugging suggestions, speeding up resolution.
️ A centralized QA hub:
Centralize test cases, results, and bug reports, ensuring seamless collaboration and accessibility for all stakeholders.

What’s the ROI?

 Time savings
 End-to-end automation
 Comprehensive coverage
 Scalability

Facing challenges with AI integration

 Complex codebases? AI sometimes struggles with dependencies.
Our solution: We divide code into manageable modules and use tools like Git for focused analysis.
 Limited context? AI might miss critical scenarios.
Our solution: We enhance prompts with detailed requirements and functional insights.
 Integration testing? Ensuring robust coverage for old and new connections is complex.
Our solution: We emphasize integration scenarios and build reusable test case libraries.

 Curious about the impact? Visit us atto see the results for yourself! Drop your feedback in the comments, we’d love to hear your thoughts.
